project1.title: Career Conferences Paul Duez
project1.desc: Complete registration management system for 400+ students with admin interface, CSV exports and real-time tracking.
project1.modalDesc:
Comprehensive web solution developed for Paul Duez High School to manage registration of over 400 students to career conferences.

Main features:
- Registration system with secure authentication
- Admin dashboard with real-time statistics
- Management of time slots and room capacities
- CSV data export for teachers
- Tracking interface for homeroom teachers
- Email notification system

Impact: Used by 400+ students and 50+ teachers, 80% reduction in administrative management time.

Technologies: PHP 8, MySQL, JavaScript, HTML/CSS, Chart.js

project2.title: Nexaria Launcher
project2.desc: Modern Minecraft launcher in Java with auto-update, mod management and Microsoft authentication.
project2.modalDesc:
Custom launcher for Minecraft server developed in Java with modern graphical interface.

Features:
- Automatic auto-update system
- Microsoft/Mojang authentication
- Smart mods and resourcepacks management
- Modern and fluid user interface
- Memory optimization with advanced settings
- Multi-profiles and versions

Technologies: Java 17, JavaFX, JSON, Mojang API

⭐ 1 star on GitHub

project3.title: EclozionMC - Website & Server
project3.desc: Complete ecosystem: Minecraft PvP-Faction server + website + shop + custom plugin system.
project3.modalDesc:
Large-scale project combining game server development and web applications for a gaming community.

Developed components:

Website:
- Modern design with animations
- Voting system with rewards
- Real-time player rankings
- Minecraft server API integration

Minecraft Server:
- Optimized PvP-Faction mode
- Custom Java/Spigot plugins
- Economy and quest system
- Automatic events

Technologies: Java (Spigot), PHP, MySQL, JavaScript, Minecraft API

project4.title: AzureLab Dashboard
project4.desc: Administration dashboard for server infrastructure with monitoring, user management and real-time logs.
project4.modalDesc:
Complete administration interface for managing server infrastructure and services.

Features:
- Real-time monitoring (CPU, RAM, disk, network)
- Multi-user management with roles
- Centralized system logs
- Service control (start/stop)
- Automatic alerts via Discord webhook
- Detailed statistics and graphs
- Responsive and modern interface

Technical stack: PHP 8, MySQL, JavaScript (Chart.js), REST API, WebSockets

Deployed on Proxmox infrastructure with Docker

project5.title: The Capsules War
project5.desc: Complete multiplayer FPS developed with Godot Engine: networking, 3D physics, scoring system and matchmaking.
project5.modalDesc:
My first complete video game, a multiplayer FPS developed from scratch with Godot engine.

Development achieved:
- Multiplayer networking with real-time synchronization
- 3D physics and collision system
- AI for bots with pathfinding
- Scoring and ranking system
- Main menu and multiplayer lobby
- Multiple maps and game modes
- Network performance optimization

Key learnings:
- Object-oriented programming (GDScript)
- Latency management and client-server prediction
- Multiplayer game architecture
- 3D optimization for gaming

Technologies: Godot Engine 4.x, GDScript, UDP/TCP networking

project6.title: Interactive Portfolio
project6.desc: This site! Modern portfolio with Discord Lanyard, 3D carousel, GSAP animations and glassmorphism design.
project6.modalDesc:
Modern portfolio developed entirely in Vanilla JavaScript without framework, demonstrating my front-end development skills.

Technical features:
- Glassmorphism UI with advanced visual effects
- Lanyard API integration (real-time Discord status)
- 3D circular carousel for projects
- Multilingual i18n system (9 languages)
- Optimized smooth animations
- PWA with Service Worker for offline cache
- Lazy loading and performance optimization
- SEO optimized with rich snippets
- 100% responsive and accessible
- Contact form with validation

Performance:
- Lighthouse Score: 95+/100
- First Contentful Paint < 1s
- No heavy external dependencies

Technologies: HTML5, CSS3 (Grid/Flexbox), Vanilla JavaScript, REST API
